name: OnRecordingPlaybackEnd
versions: This NPC callback was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when a recorded file being reproduced with NPC:StartRecordingPlayback has reached to its end.
related_fn:
NPC:StartRecordingPlayback: Starts reproducing an already recorded .rec file.
 NPC:StopRecordingPlayback: Stops reproducing a .rec file.
